channel.title: 508 Need Npc.Cfg, Npcspawn.cfg and opening doors
channel.description: I just started a 508 server but my Notepad cannot edit the .cfg files. Can anyone give me the files with the same things as RS 508? Thanks. Also can someone teach me how to make doors open?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2009, 05:59:19 am[/size][hr]Anyone help???
